name: Being as an Ocean
description: '''Being as an Ocean''' is an American [[post-hardcore]] band from [[Alpine, California]], formed in 2011. They have released six studio albums: ''Dear G-d...'', ''[[How We Both Wondrously Perish]]'', a [[Being as an Ocean (album)|self-titled album]], ''Waiting for Morning to Come'', released on 8 September 2017, ''PROXY: An A.N.I.M.O. Story'', released in 2019, and ''Death Can Wait'' in 2024. ''How We Both Wondrously Perish'' was released in May 2014 and charted at number 57 on the [[Billboard 200|''Billboard'' 200]] in the U.S.
